name: Claude Customer Support
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's customer support knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's customer support knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-customer-support (ChatBot). Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: customer-research, escalation, knowledge-management, response-drafting, ticket-triage. Rules: draft-response.md, escalate.md, kb-article.md, research.md, triage.md.
